Class PointDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdbc.JdbcDao
      • dao.RestaurantPoi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointDao

    public class PointDaoImpl
extends JdbcDao
implements PointDao
    The PointDaoImpl class responsible to execute the queries with PreparedStatement.

    This class implements the PointDao interface and extends from the JdbcDao.

        public void addPoint(Point point)
        Overrided method, from the PointDao interface. Add the input argument (Point) as a new row to the searched_point table.

      • getNearestPoint

        public Point getNearestPoint()
        Overrided method, from the PointDao interface. Select the nearest point from the db, based on meter, use the searched_point table last row for it. Swallow exception, and log that.
        Specified by:
        getNearestPoint in interface PointDao
        Returns:
        the nearest Point object

      • getNearestDistance

        public double getNearestDistance()
        Overrided method, from the PointDao interface. Select the minimum distance between searched and founded point (based on meter). Use the searched_point table last row for it. Swallow exception, and log that.
        Specified by:
        getNearestDistance in interface PointDao
        Returns:
        the minimum distance between the searched and founded point
